title: Hands On Review: Apple MacBook 12 With Retina Display 1.2GHz Intel Core M5 Rose Gold - MMGM2LL/A
description:
Apple
Apple MacBook 12 With Retina Display 1.2GHz Intel Core M5 Rose Gold - MMGM2LL/A
http://www.abt.com/product/100460/Apple-MacBook-12-With-Retina-Display-1.2GHz-Intel-Core-M5-Rose-Gold-MMGM2LLA.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=MMGM2LLA_20160503

At just 2 pounds and 13.1 mm thin MacBook is our thinnest and lightest notebook and its available in four gorgeous metal finishes. With a stunning 12-inch Retina display Apple-designed keyboard and Force Touch trackpad it features sixth-generation Intel Core M processors improved integrated graphics fast PCIe-based flash storage and all-day battery life up to 10 hours. MacBook is designed for a wireless world and is the ideal notebook for customers looking for the complete Mac experience in our most portable notebook ever.
Features:
• Thin and light design
o At just 2 pounds and 13.1 mm thin MacBook is the thinnest and lightest Mac notebook ever
• Latest Intel Core M processors
o Sixth-generation architecture is more efficient and delivers longer battery life
o Configurable to 1.3GHz dual-core Intel Core m7 with Turbo Boost up to 3.1GHz
o Operates at only 5 watts generating little heat—so it doesnt need a fan and is virtually silent when you use it
• Improved integrated graphics
o Intel HD Graphics 515 for up to 25 more graphics performance than previous generation
• Faster flash storage
o Now delivers up to 20 faster read performance and 90 faster write performance so apps launch quickly and navigating feels fluid and responsive
• An hour longer all-day battery life
o Up to 10 hours of wireless web
o Up to 11 hours of iTunes movie playback
• Versatile USB-C port
o With the industry standard USB-C port you can charge MacBook sync and charge other devices easily move content connect to an external hard drive or display and more with just one port
o Industry adoption of USB-C means several third-party accessories are available including cables adapters and storage devices which extend the flexibility and capability of your MacBook
• Stunning 12-inch Retina display
o With over 3 million pixels and a 2304- by-1440 resolution you can experience vivid images with astounding clarity
o Edge-to-edge glass display with IPS technology and a 178° viewing angle
• Apple-designed keyboard
o Full-size keyboard with butterfly mechanism for precise key movement
o Each key has its own LED for a uniform backlit keyboard
• Force Touch trackpad
o Large glass tracked surface with builtin pressure sensing capability precision tracking and Multi-Touch gesture support
o Use Force click for easier access to helpful tools and information
o Click anywhere for a uniform feel
o Click sensitivity is customizable so you can adjust how much pressure will register a click
• Other key technologies
o 802.11ac Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.0
o FaceTime camera for video calls
o Headphone port and dual microphones
